page.title: 19 FOOD IN 1985
page.content: Most people have 4 meals per day; breakfast,when they get up ,lunch,tea and supper before going to bed.For breakfast most people have cornflakes, rice krispies,or some sort of cereal, toast and a cup of tea/coffee,maybe even a glass of milk.For the two main meals of the day there is a wide choice.Most people will have potatoes,in the form of chips,boiled or baked.Popular vegetables are beans, peas,brussel sprouts,cabbage,corn,etc. Meat is also usually eaten,sausages, hamburgers,mince,chops,bacon,stew,fish fingers etc.Many foreign dishes are becoming popular eg. pizza,spaghetti, lasagne and curry.For supper you could have cheese toasties and a glass of milk.For snacks in between these meals you could have a mars bar,a packet of crisps,sweets or on a hot day an ice-lolly.
